```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

```


```{r}

plot_df <- tibble(
x <- rnorm(500, 0, 1),
y <- rnorm(500, 0, 5)
)

```

```{r}

xy_plot <- ggplot(plot_df, aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point()

xy_plot

```
